content:
Alexandru Bratan (born 23 August 1977) is a male weightlifter from Moldova. He twice competed for his native country at the Summer Olympics: 2000 and 2004. He is best known for winning the silver medal in the men's heavyweight division (â€“ 105 kg) at the 2005 World Weightlifting Championships. His brother is Eugen Bratan.
In 2006 the International Weightlifting Federation (IWF) banned Alexandru Bratan for life, for the second doping violation.
